attributes.action: Ban Political Correctness - the biggest scourge on society in the UK today
attributes.additional_details: Political Correctness is by far and above the biggest scourge on society in the UK and leads the rise on popularity of bodies such as the British National Party.  How often to we read about instances where PC has overcome common sense?  How many more victims of crime will end up in the dock or being sued nythe real criminals?  It will continue until we do somethimg about this cancer in society.  All problems, issues, etc. in comminities in the UK can in one way or another be attributed to PC somewhere along the line.  Let's ban all PC practices and allow common sense to prevail.
